amendment.description: Amendment requires an annual report to Congress regarding prevailing disparities in health care delivery as it relates to racial factors and socio-economic factors in priority populations.
amendment.purpose: Amendment no. 17 printed in the Congressional Record to require an anual report regarding prevailing disparities in health care delivery as it relates to racial factors and socioeconomic factors in priority populations.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Davis (IL) amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
